name: ban
description: MODERATION: Ban a user from the server.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to ban.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the ban.

name: kick
description: MODERATION: Kick a user from the server.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to kick.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the kick.

name: clear
description: MODERATION: Clear messages from a channel.

options.name: amount
options.description: The number of messages to clear.

name: setautorole
description: Set the auto role for new users

options.name: role
options.description: Select the auto role

name: play
description: MUSIC: Play a song from YouTube.

options.name: song
options.description: The name of the song to play.

name: volume
description: MUSIC: Control Volume.

options.name: amount
options.description: Control the volume.

name: pause
description: MUSIC: Pause the currently playing song.

name: skip
description: MUSIC: Skip the currently playing song.

name: autoplay
description: MUSIC: Autoplay songs without adding song to queue.

name: shuffle
description: MUSIC: Shuffle the songs in the queue.

name: nowplaying
description: MUSIC: Display information about the currently playing song.

name: queue
description: MUSIC: Display the list of songs in the queue.

name: mode
description: MUSIC: Adjust the mode settings of the bot.

options.name: preset
options.description: The filter to apply or remove.

name: filter
description: MUSIC: Adjust the equalizer settings of the bot.

options.name: filter
options.description: The filter to apply or remove.

name: meme
description: FUN: Fetch a random meme from the internet.

name: rps
description: FUN: Play Rock, Paper, Scissors with the bot.

name: td
description: FUN: Play a fun game of Truth or Dare.

name: welcomemsg
description: UTILITY: Set up a customized welcome message for new members.

options.name: message
options.description: The welcome message to display.

name: randomd
description: FUN: View a random user's D.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose D you want to view.

name: counting
description: FUN: Set up a counting game in a channel.

name: ascii
description: FUN: Ascii a message!

options.name: text
options.description: The message you wanna convert into Ascii.

name: ping
description: UTILITY: Check the bot's latency.

name: owner
description: INFORMATION: Get information about the creator of the Discord bot.

name: help
description: INFORMATION: Display a list of available commands.

name: avatar
description: INFORMATION: View the avatar of a user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose avatar you want to view.

name: banner
description: INFORMATION: View the banner of a user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose banner you want to view.

name: whois
description: INFORMATION: View information about a user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to get information about.

name: rank
description: INFORMATION: View your own rank or someone else's rank.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to get the rank of.

name: serverinfo
description: INFORMATION: Displays information about the server.

name: leaderboard
description: INFORMATION: Displays information about the server.

name: guilds
description: UTILITY: Displays leaderboard of servers that counts

name: snipe
description: UTILITY: Snipes the last deleted message in the channel.

name: levelsystem
description: UTILITY: Enable or disable the ranking/level system for the server.

options.name: enable
options.description: Enable the level system for the server.

options.name: disable
options.description: Disable the level system for the server.

options.name: setchannel
options.description: Set the channel for level up messages.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel for level up messages.
